message: He called into #TWiST to discuss his concerns with the name.

I like this. At least as a starting point.
The hard part about creating video ads is the VIDEO not the AD part...

@jake_gold The video _is_ the hard part true but now you don't have to do that AND Flash it in-house and then see the rich media company destroy your files as they Flash it again to add tracking and make it work on their platform. Did I mention Addroid is less than half price?
